metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3823 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The secure-session feature in the mm-video-v4l2 venc component inmediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-08-01 mishandles heap pointers, which allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug28815329.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
